paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In 51.4% (n = 13) of the cases, a positive family history was known.
Patients presented with PND-score stage I (25%, n = 6) and II (75%, n = 18); all of them could walk without assistance.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met variant is associated with TTR-FAP, leading to amyloid fibril accumulation.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation and family history.
variants.additional_notes: The study included a cohort of patients with TTR-FAP and compared them to other neuropathies.
key_quotes: Patients with TTR‐FAP were assessed either at the initial visit after diagnosis or when the first symptoms occurred before the disease had been confirmed.

tables_processed.table_caption: Patient characteristics and descriptive statistics of the selected polyneuropathy cohorts (TTR‐FAP, dPNP, CIN, and CIDP)

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for TTR variants were extracted successfully.
